content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I do believe that the apartment is a great fit for you. As a landlord, I would like to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for this property. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking that a monthly rental price of €800 would be fair. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €800. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Great, I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a question, is it possible to pay the rent monthly or quarterly?

I am a student and I don't have a stable income, so I would like to pay the rent quarterly if possible.

Thank you.

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content: I understand your concern, Mr. Li. As a landlord, I am willing to be flexible with the rental payment schedule. It is possible to pay the rent quarterly, but I would require a deposit of three months upfront to ensure that the rent is paid on time. This would give you more time to manage your finances and make payments as needed. Please let me know if this is something you are comfortable with, and we can discuss the details further.
name: Heinrich Heine
